description: An international organization from the Toriko universe dedicated to food and gourmet affairs. In this crossover episode, the IGO hosts a food tournament that serves as a cover to gather powerful fighters to help capture the dangerous creature Akami.
purpose: Regulate and promote gourmet food culture, protect rare ingredients, and handle dangerous food-related threats

keyEvents.title: Hosts Food Tournament
keyEvents.description: The IGO organizes a no-rules Food Tournament with the Carat Sizzled Cattle as the prize, attracting competitors from three different anime universes.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the premise for the crossover event.

keyEvents.title: Reveals Tournament's True Purpose
keyEvents.description: IGO Director Mansam reveals the tournament was a ruse to lure out and capture Akami, the Deep Sea Glutton, by gathering the world's strongest fighters.
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the competition into a cooperative mission against a common threat.

allies: Straw Hat Pirates (temporary alliance in crossover)
Goku and Dragon Ball Z characters (temporary alliance in crossover)
trivia: The IGO is from the Toriko universe and does not exist in the One Piece canon
This marks the organization's first interaction with One Piece characters
The IGO's plan successfully gathered three of the strongest fighters from different anime universes
